events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The system has identified the case as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the jacket.
This case has been assigned to agent Maria for handling the refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to request a refund for your jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket so I can assist you with the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 4587623, and the jacket is unused with tags still attached as I only tried it on once.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request, and you should receive the amount back within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help in resolving this swiftly.
The refund request has been processed successfully. Please send back the jacket using the pre-paid label emailed to you shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
As per your confirmation, we are closing this case. Please do not hesitate to contact us for any future assistance.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey. We would appreciate your feedback on your recent support experience.
